subject: Horse Racing
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Kentucky Derby
Preakness Stakes
Belmont Stakes
California Chrome (Race Horse)
lead_paragraph: Preparing to race at Royal Ascot this week, Perry Martin, majority owner of the famous American colt, has been accused by some people of asking too much of his modestly bred horse.
snippet: Preparing to race at Royal Ascot this week, Perry Martin, majority owner of the famous American colt, has been accused by some people of asking too much of his modestly bred horse.
